RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CUSTOMER_NO, A.CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER A WHERE ((a.access_group is not null and EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM stvw_user_access b WHERE b.user_id = global.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) or a.access_group is null) AND A.ONCE_AUTH = 'Y' AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' ORDER BY A.CUSTOMER_NO
SELECT ENTITY_TYPE, TYPE_DESC FROM OLTM_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_TYPE WHERE AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND RECORD_STAT = 'O'
SELECT COUNTRY_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM STTM_COUNTRY WHERE AUTH_STAT='A' AND RECORD_STAT='O'

RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_SUMMARY_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUENT') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'
RAD_SUMMARY.RAD_MULTIBRN_WHERECLAUSE: CUSTOMER_NO IN (select a.customer_no from sttm_core_customer a where (a.access_group is not null and exists (select 1 from stvw_user_access b where b.user_id = GLOBAL.user_id and b.access_group = a.access_group)) OR a.access_group is null) AND (SMPKS_MASK_USER.pr_setusrctx(global.user_id,'OLSCUENT') IN ('N','Y')) AND NVL(IS_FORGOTTEN,'N') = 'N'

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT DECODE(?,'Y','FAX') MEDIA FROM DUAL UNION SELECT DECODE(?,'Y','EMAIL') MEDIA FROM DUAL UNION SELECT DECODE(?,'Y','FPML') MEDIA FROM DUAL
